verses.roman:
prabhu sabāra galā dhari' karena rodana
kāndite kāndite sabāya kailā āliṅgana

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabāra—of all of them; galā—necks; dhari'-catching; karena rodana—began to cry; kāndite kāndite—crying and crying; sabāya—all of them; kailā āliṅgana—He embraced.
translation: Catching hold of His devotees, the Lord embraced them all and began to cry and cry.
